title: Creamy curried carrot soup
ingredients: ['55g butter, cubed', '300g sliced carrots', '1 large potato, peeled and cubed', '150g chopped onion', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '700ml chicken stock', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '120ml whipping cream', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
